name: Composition de trois plans ludiques
description:
A game made by Damien Chouchen (@metalchouchen) & Elodie (@mayakato)

This game was part of the Digitial Art Jam, which taking place in Paris at the Centre Pompidou.

For the jam we chose the life & artistic vision of Piet Mondrian a really strong & inspiring artist.

Thanks for playing !

How to play-1st painting

Remove the green color from the painting. There is no need to mixed color, the beauty of the nature only place in horizontal & vertical lines.

Go to a red zone and move along an horizontal line to load your power. Move along a vertical one to unleash it. If you have enough red energy, you will release the green area.

-2nd painting

Diagonals in painting ? That could not be accepted.

Move around red zones to remove diagonal paintings. Try to move around the yellow ones too.

-3rd painting

Diagonal in painting ? Let me think about it.

Join the blue zone
